body.name: Stove Top Covers Electric Stove Cover - Heat Resistant No Crease Ceramic Glass Top Stove Covers, Flat RV Range Stovetop Protector, Induction Cooktop Oven Mat for Kitchen Appliances, XL Dish Drying Mat
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【HEAT RESISTANT】The glass top anti-scalding silicone mat stove cover doubles as a silicone trivet mat capable of holding hot pots and pans. With heat resistance up to 450°F, its raised wide ridges serve to separate the hot pot from the cooktop, safeguarding your kitchen surfaces from scalding. TIPS: Avoid placing the electric cooktop cover on the stove when its temperature exceeds 450°F to prevent potential damage.

【Glass Top Stove Cover】This 28" x 20" inches extra large silicone stove cover for glass top electric stove,itchen counter top, electric cooktop, table, or washer-dryer top, safeguards your electric glass top stoves from scratches, spill, and stains. It keeps the surface clean and tidy while providing an expandable workbench for food preparation.

【Kitchen Dish Drying Mat】The unique design of wide raised line ridges increases air circulation, improves ventilation, and catches drips from dishes, glasses, fruits, and vegetables. With high edges and a waterproof bottom, it keeps the countertop dry and clean, making it an ideal kitchen dish-drying mat.

【Easy To Clean】This stovetop counter cover is effortless to clean and maintain, becoming very clean again. You can easily wipe off any spills or water droplets. For thorough cleaning, it can be directly rinsed or brushed with water or even tossed in a dishwasher. Its flexible material allows it to roll or fold up for hassle-free storage.

【Extra Kitchen Counter Space】Our induction cooktop mat is not just a silicone stove top guard protector; it doubles as a food prep station, ensuring your electric cooktop remains pristine. It can create extra space quickly, maximizing food prep space or workspace in the kitchen area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for covering up scratches on glass top stoves.
reviews.reviewText: My glass induction cooker has been used for a long time and has many ugly scratches on it. This silicone stove cover can cover it very well and expand the usable space. like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Glass Top Protection!
reviews.reviewText: This product works great on my glass top stove by protecting it as we have people over and use the stove top to put food on. It does seem a little hard to clean as crumbs want to stick to it but other than that great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stove Top Cover
reviews.reviewText: The product is great for Electric Stove.It's made with Silicon making it easy to fold and wash.Gets cleaned easily with wet cloth.True in size and perfect fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The stove cover is super nice. It will be easy to clean. It fits the stove absolutely perfectly. My stove is 30 inches wide 26 inches deep, 28 inches with the handle deep. I love it! It will definitely protect my stove from any further damage! I wish I had had this before my stove got broken. It might have saved it from getting broken! In the picture, it is ridge side up, so you could actually drain dishes on it. I might be using it for that myself since I never have enough space, and that small kitchen the way it’s designed. I would highly recommend it!
